RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: PatternEditor Find And Replace
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: taktik [taktik@renoise.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: A tool for finding & replacing raw pattern data (notes, insturments, fx, ...) with simple wildcard support and the ability to batch replace all occurences. Shows up as 'Find And Replace...' in the Pattern Editor's context menu.
